title: consumer liability
extract: Consumer product liability law is the set of rules that holds a manufacturer responsible when a product it makes injures someone. Typically, consumer product liability laws apply to items that cause physical injuries, usually because they are defective in some way.
extract_html: Consumer product liability law is the set of rules that holds a manufacturer responsible when a product it makes injures someone. Typically, consumer product liability laws apply to items that cause physical injuries, usually because they are defective in some way.
